name: Delhi Metro Mascot Maitree illustration
description: This file includes the 3d illustration of the famous mascot of Delhi metro which was named as Maitree. In 2012 a woman gave birth to a girl child in metro coach. Because the help of Delhi metro and delhi govt. the parents decided to name their child "Maitree" as a token of gratitude and the DMRC made Maitree their official mascot because the word means friendship.
